ch0004_00_toko/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I figured I’d run into you if I waited here.
ch0004_00_toko/0101_0701_02_10:
Things just aren’t as exciting
if you’re not around.
Come on, let’s do our best today!
ch0004_00_toko/0601_0701_01_10:
I’m well known as a Trainer
who’s good in battles!
ch0004_00_toko/0601_0701_02_10:
I’ve gotten good at what I love,
and what I love is winning battles!
ch0004_00_toko/0601_0701_03_10:
Winning a no-holds-barred battle...
It’s the best feeling in the world!
ch0004_00_toko/0601_0702_01_10:
When you battle, don’t you
get that real strong desire to win?
Especially if it’s against a strong opponent!
ch0004_00_toko/0601_0702_02_10:
I bet you like to win, too, don’t you?
If so, you might do some amazing things
in battle someday!
ch0004_00_toko/0602_0701_01_10:
I want to experience for myself
every fun thing that there is.
ch0004_00_toko/0602_0701_02_10:
I keep finding new things I want to try out...
And before I know it, my schedule’s
just bursting at the seams!
ch0004_00_toko/0602_0701_03_10:
*sigh*
I wish days were much, muuuuuch longer.
ch0004_00_toko/0602_0702_01_10:
My schedule is packed full, but don’t worry!
I can handle this—no problem.
ch0004_00_toko/0602_0702_02_10:
Don’t you underestimate the potential of
the expert Trainer Hilda!
ch0004_00_toko/0603_0701_01_10:
My Tepig is a dear partner to me.
She’s kept me company through all my traveling.
ch0004_00_toko/0603_0701_02_10:
I feel like my dream of becoming the best
Trainer in the world will come true if
I’m with Tepig.
ch0004_00_toko/0603_0701_03_10:
And you better believe I’m gonna make it real!
I hope you’re as excited as I am for that day!
ch0004_00_toko/0603_0702_01_10:
You know, when I give Tepig food,
she always sears it before eating it.
ch0004_00_toko/0603_0702_02_10:
So I make sure to give her food that won’t get
ruined even if it’s heated up!
ch0004_00_toko/0603_0702_03_10:
I still can’t forget the look Tepig gave me after
she tried to cook ice cream and melted it...
ch0004_00_toko/0604_0701_01_10:
I learned through my travels that the world is
really huge—and that both Pokémon and people
all have different ideas and ways of thinking.
ch0004_00_toko/0604_0701_02_10:
So, maybe my travels would have been different
if I’d traveled with some other Pokémon
instead of Tepig.
ch0004_00_toko/0604_0701_03_10:
But I am who I am, and I met you because I’m
with Tepig.
ch0004_00_toko/0604_0701_04_10: That’s what I call a fateful encounter!
ch0004_00_toko/0604_0702_01_10:
I don’t spend a lot of time
thinking about “What if...”
ch0004_00_toko/0604_0702_02_10: Because for me, right now is the best there is!
ch0004_00_toko/0604_0702_03_10:
There’s no point in regretting things
after they happen. I’d rather
spend the time enjoying battles!
ch0004_00_toko/0605_0701_01_10:
You know, it’s something that’ll
have to wait for another day, but...
ch0004_00_toko/0605_0701_02_10:
There’s one person I really, 
really want to battle against.
ch0004_00_toko/0605_0701_04_10:
I think you’ll become an even stronger,
even more amazing Trainer than you are now.
ch0004_00_toko/0605_0701_05_10:
And once you get there, I want to have 
an all-out battle with you.
One Trainer against another.
ch0004_00_toko/0605_0701_06_10:
I want to be someone who’s always strong,
always cool... Someone people look up to.
That’s my goal.
ch0004_00_toko/0605_0702_01_10:
When the time comes to battle you,
I’m not going to hold anything back!
ch0004_00_toko/0605_0702_02_10:
It’d be super uncool if I didn’t give
100 percent when we’re about to decide
who’s the most powerful Trainer!
ch0004_00_toko/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, it’s you!
Mmm, just one minute...
ch0004_00_toko/1701_0701_02_10: Ah, found it! Here, this is for you!
ch0004_00_toko/1701_0701_03_10:
Didn’t you want something like this?
Even if not, I’m sure it’ll come in handy.
Keep it!
ch0004_00_toko/1701_0702_01_10:
If I find anything else,
I’ll be sure to let you know!
ch0004_00_toko/2501_0701_01_10:
Not to brag or anything, but you know this sync
pair right here is pretty strong in battle, right?
ch0004_00_toko/2501_0701_02_10:
So I always get asked about the secret to
becoming stronger.
ch0004_00_toko/2501_0701_03_10:
But to be honest, I don’t really have a good
answer to that...
ch0004_00_toko/2501_0701_04_10:
It’s like...hard to explain. Instinct, I guess?
I focus so much on the battle that I don’t
really remember what I do.
ch0004_00_toko/2501_0701_05_10:
I wonder if my Pokémon has
the same kind of thing...
ch0004_00_toko/2501_0702_01_10:
The only thing I think about during battle
is the word “victory”!
ch0004_00_toko/2501_0702_02_10:
I think my Pokémon’s the same, too.
We become more in sync every time we battle!
ch0004_00_toko/2501_0702_03_10:
So we’re able to...really, y’know,
click and be in the zone.
ch0004_00_toko/2511_0701_01_10:
I’ve been told that our sync pair seems to be full
of spirit and determination whenever we battle.
ch0004_00_toko/2511_0701_02_10:
I guess it makes sense. I definitely 
don’t want to lose, so I get in the zone.
ch0004_00_toko/2511_0701_03_10:
Winning is cool!
That’s all that matters!
ch0004_00_toko/2511_0701_04_10:
*sigh* I’m joking, of course! 
But don’t you think that’s 
a cool way to look at it?
ch0004_00_toko/2511_0701_05_10:
I mean, we’re definitely getting stronger, so
why not let people see it?
ch0004_00_toko/2511_0702_01_10:
It’s not like I’m trying to intimidate my
opponents, OK?
You don’t have to believe me, but it’s true.
ch0004_00_toko/2511_0702_02_10:
Still, even my partner seems to...radiate
strength, I guess?
ch0004_00_toko/2511_0702_03_10:
I feel like she’s grown in confidence since I
first met her.
ch0004_00_toko/2511_0702_04_10:
Heh, it’s definitely reliable!
I’m really proud of my partner.
ch0004_00_toko/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! Let’s go get ’em again today!
ch0004_00_toko/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning! I’m looking forward to a
bunch more Pokémon battles today!
ch0004_00_toko/3003_0701_01_10: Hi! Afternoon already, huh? What are you up to?
ch0004_00_toko/3004_0701_01_10:
Hi! Now that you’re here,
let’s go have some fun!
ch0004_00_toko/3005_0701_01_10: Hey! Still ready for more, huh?
ch0004_00_toko/3006_0701_01_10: Hey! Is it that late already? Time sure does fly!
